 2021-06342021-06-24,  ,  LAB,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS in order to increase the maximum length of the leave related to COVID-19 under the Canada Labour Code to align with the changes to the Canada Recovery Caregiving Benefit (CRCB).
